name: Eugene LAMBERT, Appellant, v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Secretary Beard, S.C.I. Huntingdon, Appellees

parties: Eugene LAMBERT, Appellant, v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Secretary Beard, S.C.I. Huntingdon, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of July, 2006, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
901 A.2d 493
Eugene LAMBERT, Appellant, v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Secretary Beard, S.C.I. Huntingdon, Appellees.
